name: BHATAKTI ATMA Music
description: Open-Source bot to play songs in your Telegram's Group Voice Chat. Powered by PyTgCalls.

BOT_USERNAME.description: Put Bot Username Without '@' Ex:- ZINDA_H_TU_MERE_LIYE_HEART_HACK

SUDO_USERS.description: List of user IDs counted as admin everywhere (separated by space).

DURATION_LIMIT.description: Max audio duration limit for downloads (minutes).
